body:
Hello everyone,

I've prepared a [GitHub Gist](https://gist.github.com/cpmech/87254761d8762622da1692b5deb64925) and a set of [Videos](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9vFODRZTBcc&feature=youtu.be&list=PLk1POg2YgVEJXOe-kl3G0jgYE9zgP2xfM) illustrating the whole process from installing a C/Fortran based tool named LAPACK, it's connection with Go, the patching process, and the successful execution.

The *issue* (before the patch with Go1.6.3 on Windows) is [illustrated here](https://youtu.be/WF7NUifrh9o?list=PLk1POg2YgVEJXOe-kl3G0jgYE9zgP2xfM&t=81)

After the patch, the code works [as seen here](https://youtu.be/Bgl_SrsN7Xg?list=PLk1POg2YgVEJXOe-kl3G0jgYE9zgP2xfM&t=100)

Thanks again Alex and everyone.
Cheers
Dorival
